channel.title: The Midderlands Expanded PDF is Free Today
channel.description:
I saw on Twitter that Monkeyblood Designs is giving away the expanded PDF of The Midderlands. It's only free for a day or so. Make sure you nab it if you want it!
"Written for use with the Swords & Wizardry Complete roleplaying game, but suitable for any Old-School D&D-style roleplaying game. More green-hued, twisted, dark-fantasy, old-school mini-setting. Now expanded to include the whole of the British Isles and beyond."
Link to the PDF: https://monkeyblooddesign.co.uk/product/the-midderlands-expanded-pdf-version/ Link to the initial tweet: https://twitter.com/Monk3yBlood/status/1195747917283377152?s=20

item.title: The Midderlands Expanded PDF is Free Today
item.dc:creator: @Frasersimons
item.description:
@Frasersimons wrote:

I saw on Twitter that Monkeyblood Designs is giving away the expanded PDF of The Midderlands. It’s only free for a day or so. Make sure you nab it if you want it!

“Written for use with the Swords & Wizardry Complete roleplaying game, but suitable for any Old-School D&D-style roleplaying game.
More green-hued, twisted, dark-fantasy, old-school mini-setting. Now expanded to include the whole of the British Isles and beyond.”

Link to the PDF: https://monkeyblooddesign.co.uk/product/the-midderlands-expanded-pdf-version/
Link to the initial tweet: https://twitter.com/Monk3yBlood/status/1195747917283377152?s=20
